description: Your inner child giggles like crazy because you've gotten your hands on a machine that's very much classified technology.  Needs to be placed and plugged into a power source to use.

use_action.description: Analyze any fossils or samples you might have available.

description: A tool that looks suspiciously similar to a cordless drill.  Keeping this on you during dissections will allow you to harvest tissue samples.  Or you can press the button on the back of it to try harvesting tissue samples from plantlife.
